lexUnit.name: fat.a
lexUnit.definition: COD: (of a person or animal) having much excess fat; corpulent.

sentence.text: The editor , Pamela Hellebore , was fat .
Now , I do n't understand how I could ever have thought I was fat .
It pays not to overfeed adult ferrets at times when they are not working or they become fat and lazy .
Mum was feeling much better , and she was active again , though she 'd become very fat at Ted and Jean 's .
She had become rather fat , white , fatty faced , pasty from her indoor vigil over her own complaints , and the soft white face flesh could threaten tears very readily .
` Right then , " said Kerly , giving the fat girl a curt nod .
If only she could have waved a magic wand to turn the fat girl into a raving beauty .
Big fat girls , some sporting cropped heads and tattoos , had sought to smother him with their unsavoury affections .
She was sitting at a littered table with two noisy West Indians in colourful pullovers and a jaded , almost middle-aged fat lady with a fur coat .
The fat lady shrieked and the two Caribbeans twitched their long , loose limbs , delighted with themselves .
The seat on my left was occupied by a fat lady who was busy peeling an orange .
“ Thus , ” said the fat man , “ your message must be distinctly urgent … ”
The fat man withdrew , drawing a baffle-curtain across the mouth of the Astropath 's furry womb-cave .
In the centre of Cheapside stood the stocks , empty except for one person , a large , fat man , his head securely clasped between the wooden slats .
The fat man over to his right had leaned down to the floor .
Reviewing other medical studies of large populations , the authors dispel another myth , that fat people consume more calories than thin people .

Although most fat people simply eat too much by normal standards , there are many who are equally gluttonous but remain thin , and some fat people remain fat in spite of eating much less than normal .
It might also suggest that if fat people have psychological problems , these may well be a result of the obesity , or at most a contributory factor .
Fat people ca n't stop eating because someday there will be no more cream cakes .
If one of your friends lost this amount of weight from one Christmas to the next , changed from a fat person into a slim and healthy person , you would certainly notice !
Mrs Sparsit 's great-aunt , ` an immensely fat old woman , with an inordinate appetite for butcher 's meat , and a mysterious leg which had now refused to get out of bed for fourteen years " .

The stigma attached to fat means that we are low-status as lovers , thus people who are attracted to fat women may repress their desire because they risk ridicule and pity if they choose such a low-status lover .
Some fat women do not define themselves sexually because they do not consider themselves sexually viable , and see no point in labelling themselves in a vacuum .
Fat women have to travel miles to buy underwear , and our choice of erotic , indeed all , clothing is minimal .
I feel fat , gross -- even my legs feel flabby , but how can that be ?
You 've grown fat and lazy since I saw you last . "
